name: SLiME Game (Doggollamaman)
description:
I decided to give Godot game engine a try so am making this first 2d game as a test, I may make it better and an actual project. 

There currently isn't much to do however I will be adding chests, items, doors, levels and maybe even enemies.

I have experimented with tile maps and auto tile features which making level design a very easy process.
